        public <T> reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Message<T>> request(java.lang.Class<T> responsePayloadClass,
                                                           java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                           Message<?> message)
        Creates a Mono that send a request on subscription and completes with response on receiving it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of response payload
        Parameters:
        responsePayloadClass - class to map response payload to
        serviceName - name of service, that should handle the request
        message - the message
        Returns:
        the request Mono

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of response payload
        Parameters:
        responsePayloadClass - class to map response payload to
        serviceName - name of service, that should handle the request
